phrase.cizu_name: on tiptoe(或 tiptoes)(北美亦作 on one's tiptoes)

jx.jx_en_mean: with one's heels raised and one's weight on the balls of the feet, especially in order to move quietly or make oneself taller

lj.lj_ly: Jane stood on tiptoe to kiss him.
The children were on tiptoe before the birthday party.
lj.lj_ls: 孩子们都急切地等待着生日晚会的开始

entry.tran: 踮起脚走;蹑手蹑脚地走
entry.def: If you tiptoe somewhere, you walk there very quietly without putting your heels on the floor when you walk.

example.ex: She slipped out of bed and tiptoed to the window.
example.tran: 她溜下床，蹑手蹑脚地走到窗户旁边。

entry.def: If you do something on tiptoe or on tiptoes, you do it standing or walking on the front part of your foot, without putting your heels on the ground.

example.ex: She leaned her bike against the stone wall and stood on tiptoe to peer over it.
example.tran: 她把自行车斜靠在石墙上，踮起脚往墙内张望。

means.word_mean: 1. walking on the tips of ones's toes so as to make no noise;
1. on tiptoe or as if on tiptoe;

auth_sentence.content: Others have found ways to tiptoe around gym rules.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others have found ways to tiptoe around gym rules.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Others have found ways to tiptoe around gym rules.

auth_sentence.content: Her high heels tilted her nearly to tiptoe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her high heels tilted her nearly to tiptoe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her high heels tilted her nearly to tiptoe.

auth_sentence.content: Standing on tiptoe he could just reach the wooden latch.
auth_sentence.res_content: Standing on tiptoe he could just reach the wooden latch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Standing on tiptoe he could just reach the wooden latch.

means.word_mean: 用脚尖站立(或走路)；踮起脚尖

sentences.en: She had to stand on tiptoe to reach the top shelf.
sentences.cn: 她得踮起脚尖才能够到顶层的架子。

sentences.en: We crept around on tiptoes so as not to disturb him.
sentences.cn: 为了不打扰他，我们都踮起脚尖走路。

means.word_mean: 踮着脚走;蹑手蹑脚地走

sentences.en: He tiptoed quietly up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他踮着脚轻轻走上楼梯。

sentences.en: She tiptoed quietly out of the room so as not to wake him up.
sentences.cn: 她蹑手蹑脚地从房间走出去, 以免吵醒他。

sentences.en: I stood tiptoe upon a little hill.
sentences.cn: 我踮着脚站在一座小山顶上。
